description.displayText: Terrie is a highly skilled care giver, knowledgeable and empathetic. She managed the following medical needs for my elderly brother: use of oxygen daily, care of oxygen apparatus, monitoring medication, driving him to medical appointments, arranging doctor's appointments, working with visiting nurse service, bandaging his leg sores, food shopping, and personal care. In addition, she has kept notes of all medical visits, tests results and prescriptions for the family. At this time, my brother needs live in help; I am grateful to Terrie for the wonderful care she has given my brother and I recommend her as the consummate care giver.

description.displayText: Terrie has a remarkable range of skills and cares greatly about taking good care of seniors. We hired her, but due to circumstances beyond our control, we weren't able to move forward as planned. Still, my family liked her tremendously. She is exceptionally organized, responsible,  perceptive and pro-active.
